Translations.Text: bahuth ba barkath hai wo (Allah) jis ke haath mein badshaahi hai aur jo har cheez par khudrath rakhne waala hai
jis ne mauth aur hayaath ko is liye paida kiya, tumhe azmaaye, ke tum mein se acche kaam kaun karta hai aur wo ghaaleb (aur) baqshne waala hai
jis ne saath asmaan upar ta-le banaaye (to aye dekhne waale) Allah rahmaan ki paidaayish mein koyi be-zaab-tagi na dekhega, dubaara (nazre daal kar) dekh le, kya koyi shigaaf bhi nazar aa raha hai
phir duhra kar do do baar dekh le, teri nigaah teri taraf zaleel wa (aajiz) ho kar thaki hoyi laut aayegi
beshak hum ne asmaan dunya ko chiraagho (sitaaro) se araasta kiya aur unhe shaitaano ke maarne ka zariya bana diya aur shaitaano ke liye hum ne (dozakh ka jalaane waala) azaab tayyaar kar diya
aur apne rab ke saath kufr karne waalo ke liye jahannam ka azaab hai aur wo kya hee buri jageh hai
jab us mein ye daale jayenge, to us ki badi zoor ki awaaz sunenge aur wo josh maar rahi hogi
qareeb hai ke (abhi) ghusse ke maare phat jaaye, jab kabi us mein koyi gruh daala jayega, us se jahannam ke daarogha pochenge ke kya tumhaare paas daraane waala koyi nahi aaya tha
wo jawaab denge ke beshak ayaa tha, lekin hum ne ose jhutlaaya aur hum ne kaha ke Allah ta’ala ne kuch bhi naazil nahi farmaaya, tum bahuth badi gumraahi mein hee ho
aur kahenge ke agar hum sunte hote ya aqal rakhte hote, to dozakhiyo mein (shareek) na hote
pas unhone apne jurm ka eqbaal kar liya, ab ye dozakhi dafa ho (door ho)
beshak jo log apne parvardigaar se ghayebaana taur par darte rehte hai un ke liye baqshish hai aur bada sawaab hai
tum apni baatho ko chupaao ya zaaher karo, wo to sino ki poshidgiyo ko bhi ba-qoobi jaanta hai
kya wahi na jaane jis ne paida kiya? phir wo bareek been aur ba-qabar bhi ho
wo zaath jis ne tumhaare liye zameen ko pasth wa muti kar diya ta ke tum us ki raaho mein chalte phirte raho aur Allah ki roziya khaao (piyo) osi ki taraf (tumhe) ji kar uth khada hona hai
kya tum is baath se be-khauf ho gaye ho ke asmaano waala tumhe zameen mein dhasa de aur achaanak zameen larazne lage
ya kya tum us baath se nidar ho gaye ho ke asmaano waala tum par patthar barsaade? phir to tumhe maloom ho hee jayega ke mera daraana kaisa tha
aur un se pehle logo ne bhi jhutlaaya tha, to dekho un par mera azaab kaisa kuch hoa
kya ye apne upar, par khole hoye aur (kabhi kabhi) simte hoye (odne waale) parindo ko nahi dekhte, unhe (Allah) rahmaan hee (hawa wa fiza mein) thaame hoye hai, beshak har cheez us ki nigaah mein hai
sivaaye Allah ke tumhaara wo kaun sa lashkar hai jo tumhaari madad kar sa ke, kaafir to saraasar dhuke hee mein hai
agar Allah ta’ala apni rozi rok le to bataao kaun hai jo phir tumhe rozi dega? balke (kaafir) to sarkashi aur bidakne par ad gaye hai
accha wo shaqs zyaada hidaayath waala hai jo apne mu ke bal aundha ho kar chale ya wo jo sidha (pairo ke bal) raahe raasth par chala ho
keh dijiye ke wahi (Allah) hai jis ne tumhe paida kiya aur tumhaare kaan aankhe aur dil banaaye, tum bahuth hee kam shukr guzaari karte ho
keh dijiye! ke wahi hai jis ne tumhe zameen mein phayla diya aur us ki taraf tum ekhatte kiye jaoge
(kaafir) pochte hai ke wo waada kab zaaher hoga, agar tum sacche ho (to bataao)
aap keh dijiye ke us ka ilm to Allah hee ko hai, main to sirf khule taur par agaah kar dene waala hoon
jab ye log us waadee ko qareeb tar pa lenge, us waqth un kaafiro ke chehre bigad jayenge aur keh diya jayega ke yahi hai jise tum talab kiya karte thein
aap keh dijiye! accha agar mujhe aur mere saathiyo ko Allah ta’ala halaak karde ya hum par rahem kare, (beher surath ye to bataao) ke kaafiro ko dard naak azaab se kaun bachayega
aap keh dijiye! ke wahi rahmaan hai, hum to us par imaan la chuke aur osi par hamaara bharosa hai, tumhe an-qareeb maloom ho jayega ke sarih gumraahi mein kaun hai
aap keh dijiye! ke accha ye to bataao ke, agar tumhaare (pine ka) paani zameen mein utar jaaye to kaun hai jo tumhaare liye nithra hoa paani laaye
noon, qasam hai qalam ki aur us ki, jo kuch ke wo (farishte) likhte hai
tu apne rab ke fazl se deewana nahi hai
aur beshak tere liye be intehaa ajr hai
aur beshak tu bahuth bade (umdah) aqlaaq par hai
pas ab tu bhi dekh lega aur ye bhi dekh lenge
ke tum mein se kaun fitne mein pada hoa hai
beshak tera rab apni raah se behekne waalo ko qoob jaanta hai aur wo raah yaafta logo ko bhi ba-qoobi jaanta hai
pas tu jhutlaane waalo ki na maan
wo to chaahte hai ke tu zara dheela ho, to ye bhi dheele pad jaaye
aur tu kisi aise shaqs ka bhi kaha na maanna jo zyaada qasme khaane waala
be-vaqaar, kamina, ayb go, choghal qoor
bhalaayi se rokne waala, hadh se bad jaane waala gunehgaar
gardan kash, phir saath hee be nasab ho
us ki sarkashi sirf is liye hai ke wo maal waala aur beto waala hai
jab us ke saamne hamaari aayate padi jaati hai to keh deta hai ke ye to aglo ke qisse hai
hum bhi is ki soong (naak) par daagh denge
beshak hum ne unhe isi tarah azmaa liya, jis tarah hum ne baagh waalo ko azmaaya tha, jab ke unhone qasme khaayi ke subaah hote hee, us baagh ke phal utaar lenge
aur InshaAllah na kaha
pas us par tere rab ki jaanib se ek bala, chaaro taraf ghoom gayi aur ye so hee rahe thein
pas wo baagh aisa ho gaya jaise kati hoyi kheti
ab subah hote hee unhone ek dosre ko awaaze di
ke agar tumhe phal utaarne hai, to apni kheti par sawere hee sawere chal pado
phir ye sab chupke chupke ye batein karte hoye chale
ke aaj ke din koyi miskeen tumhaare paas na aane paaye
aur lapke hoye subah subah gaye (samajh rahe thein) ke hum qaabo pa gaye
jab unhone baagh dekha to kehne lage yaqinan hum raasta bhol gaye
nahi nahi balke hamaari qismath phot gayi
un sab mein jo behtar tha, us ne kaha ke main tum se na kehta tha ke tum Allah ki paakizgi kyo nahi bayaan karte
to sab kehne lage hamaara rab paak hai, beshak hum hee zaalim thein
phir wo ek dosre ki taraf rukh kar ke aapas mein malaamath karne lage
kehne lage haay afsoos! yaqinan hum sarkash thein
kya ajab hai ke hamaara rab hamein is se behtar badhla de de, hum to ab apne rab se hee aarzo rakhte hai
yo hee aafath aati hai aur aaqirath ki aafath bahuth badi hai, kaash unhe samajh hoti
parhezgaaro ke liye un ke rab ke paas nemato waali jannate hai
kya hum musalmaano ko misl gunehgaaro ke kar denge
tumhe kya ho gaya, kaise faisle kar rahe ho
kya tumhaare paas koyi kitaab hai jis mein tum padte ho
ke us mein tumhaari man maani batein ho
ya tum ne hum se kuch qasme li hai? jo qayaamath tak baaqi rahe, ke tumhaare liye wo sab hai jo tum apni taraf se muqarrar karlo
un se pucho to ke un mein se kaun is baath ka zimmedaar (aur daawedaar) hai
kya un ke koyi shraeek hai? to chahiye ke apne apne shariko ko le aaye, agar ye sacche hai
jis din pindli khol di jayegi aur sajde ke liye bulaaye jayenge to (sajda) na kar sakenge
nigaahe nichi hongi aur un par zillath wa qaari cha rahi hogi, halaan ke ye sajde ke liye (us waqt bhi) bulaaye jaate thein jab ke sahih saalim thein
pas mujhe aur us kalaam ko jhutlaane waale ko chohd de, hum unhe is tarah aahista aahista khinchenge ke unhe maaloom bhi na hoga
aur main unhe dheel donga, beshak meri tadbeer badi mazbooth hai
kya tu un se koyi ujrath chahta hai jis ke taawaan1se ye dabe jaate ho
ya kya un ke paas ilme ghayb hai jise wo likhte ho
pas tu apne rab ke hukm ka sabr se (intezaar kar) aur machli waale ki tarah na hoja, jab ke us ne gham ki haalath mein dua ki
agar ose us ke rab ki nemath na paa leti to yaqinan wo bure haalo mein, chatyal maydaan mein daal diya jaata
ose us ke rab ne phir nawaaza aur ose nek-kaaro mein kar diya
aur qareeb hai ke kaafir apni tez nigaaho se aap ko phusla de, jab kabhi Qur’aan sunte hai aur keh dete hai ye to zaroor deewana hai
dar haqiqath ye (Qur’aan) to tamaam jahaan waalo ke liye saraasar nasihath hee hai
saabith hone waali
saabith hone waali kya hai
aur tujhe kya maloom ke wo saabith shuda kya hai
us khad-ka dene waali ko samoodh aur aadh ne jhut laya tha
(jis ke natije mein) samoodh to be hadh khauf naak aur (oonchi) awaaz se halaak kar diye gaye
aur aadh be hadh tez wa tundh hawa se ghaarath kar diye gaye
jise un par lagataar saath raath aur aat din tak (Allah ne) musallath kar rakha, pas tum dekhte ke ye log zameen par is tarah gir gaye jaise khajoor ke khukle ta ne ho
kya un mein se koyi bhi, tujhe baaqi nazar aa raha hai
feraun aur us se pehle ke log aur jin ki bastiyaa ulatdi gayi, unhone ne bhi qataaye ki
aur apne rab ke rasool ki na farmaani ki (bil aaqir) Allah ne unhe (bhi) zabardasth girift mein le liya
jab paani mein tughyaani aa gayi, to us waqth hum ne tumhe kashti mein chada liya
ta ke ose tumhaare liye nasihath aur yaad gaar bana de aur (ta ke) yaad rakhne waale kaan ose yaad rakhe
pas jab ke soor mein ek phok phuki jayegi
aur zameen aur pahaad utha liye jayenge aur ek hee chot mein reza reza kar diye jayenge
us din ho padne waali (qayaamath) ho padegi
aur asmaan phat jayega aur us din bilkul bodha ho jayega
us ke kinaaro par farishte honge aur tere parvardigaar ka arsh us din aat (farishte) apne upar uthaaye hoye honge
us din tum sab saamne pesh kiye jaoge, tumhaara koyi bhed pushida na rahega
so jise us ka naame amaal us ke daaye haath mein diya jayega, to wo kehne lagega ke lo mera naame amaal pado
mujhe to kaamil yaqeen tha ke mujhe apna hisaab milna hai
pas wo ek dil pasandh zindagi mein hoga
bulandh wa baala jannath mein
jis ke mewe jhuke pade honge
(un se kaha jayega) ke maze se khaao piyo apne un amaal ke badhle jo tum ne guzishta zamaane mein kiye
lekin jise us (ke amaal) ki kitaab us ke baaye haath mein di jayegi, wo to kahega ke kaash ke mujhe meri kitaab di hee na jaati
aur main jaanta hee na ke hisaab kya hai
kaash! ke mauth (mera) kaam hee tamaam kar deti
mere maal ne bhi mujhe kuch nafa na diya
mera ghalba bhi mujh se jaata raha
(hukm hoga) ose pakad lo, phir ose tauq pehna do
phir ose dozakh mein daal do
phir ose aisi zanjeer mein jis ki paimaayish sattar haath ki hai jakad do
beshak ye Allah azmath waale par imaan na rakhta tha
aur miskeen ke khilaane par raghbath na dilaata tha
pas aaj us ka na koyi dosth hai
aur na sivaaye peep ke us ki koyi ghiza hai
jise gunahgaaro ke siva koyi nahi khayega
pas mujhe qasam hai un chizo ki jinhe tum dekhte ho
aur un chizo ki jinhe tum nahi dekhte
ke beshak ye Qur’aan buzrug rasool ka khaul hai
ye kisi shaayar ka khaul nahi (afsoos) tumhe bahuth kam yaqeen hai
aur na kisi kaahin ka khaul hai(afsoos) bahuth kam nasihath le rahe ho
(ye to) rabbul aalameen ka utaara hoa hai
aur agar ye hum par koyi bhi baath bana leta
to albatta hum us ka dahna haath pakad lete
phir us ki shay rag kaat dete
phir tum mein se koyi bhi mujhe us se rokne waala na hota
yaqinan ye Qur’aan parhezgaaro ke liye nasihath hai
hamein puri tarah maloom hai ke tum mein se baaz us ke jhutlaane waale hai
beshak (ye jhutlaana) kaafiro par hasrath hai
aur beshak (wa shuba) ye yaqini haq hai
pas tu apne rab azeem ki paaki bayaan kar
ek sawaal karne waale ne us azaab ka sawaal kiya, jo waazeh hone waala hai
kaafiro par jise koyi hataane waala nahi
us Allah ki taraf se jo sidiyo waala hai
jis ki taraf farishte aur ruh chadte hai, ek din mein jis ki meqdaar pachaas hazaar saal ki hai
pas tu acchi tarah sabr kar
beshak ye us (azaab) ko door samajh rahe hai
aur hum ose qareeb dekhte hai
jis din asmaan misl tel ki til chat ke ho jayega
aur pahaad misl rangeen oon ke ho jayenge
aur koyi dosth kisi dosth ko na pochega
(halaan ke) ek dosre ko dikha diye jayenge, gunahgaar us din ke azaab ke badhle fidye mein apne beto ko
apni biwi ko aur apne bhai ko
aur apne kumbe ko jo ose panaah deta tha
aur roye zameen ke sab logo ko dena chahega, ta ke ye ise najaath dila de
(magar) har giz ye na hoga, yaqinan wo shole waali (aag) hai
jo mu aur sar ki khaal khinch laane waali hai
wo har us shaqs ko pukaaregi jo piche hat ta aur mu modta hai
aur jama kar ke sambhaal rakhta hai
beshak insaan bade kacche dil waala banaya gaya hai
jab ose musibath pahonchti hai to had bada uthta hai
aur jab raahath milti hai to buql karne lagta hai
magar wo namaazi
jo apni namaaz par hameshgi karne waale hai
aur jin ke maalo mein muqarrara hissa hai
maangne waalo ka bhi aur sawaal se bachne waalo ka bhi
aur jo insaaf ke din par yaqeen rakhte hai
aur jo apne rab ke azaab se darte rehte hai
beshak un ke rab ka azaab be khauf hone ki cheez nahi
aur jo log apni sharam-gaaho ki (haraam se) hifaazath karte hai
haan un ki biwiyo aur laundiyo ke baare mein, jin ke wo maalik hai, unhe koyi malaamath nahi
ab jo koyi us ke alaawa (raah) dhundega to aise log hadh se guzar jaane waale honge
aur jo apni amaanato ka aur apne khaul wa qaraar ka paas rakhte hai
aur jo apni gawaahiyo par sidhe aur qaayam rehte hai
aur jo apni namaazo ki hifaazath karte hai
yahi log jannato mein izzath waale honge
pas kaafiro ko kya ho gaya hai ke wo teri taraf daudte aate hai
daaye aur baaye se gruh ke gruh
kya un mein se har ek ki tawaqqe ye hai ke wo nemato waali jannath mein daakhil kiya jayega
(aisa) har giz na hoga, hum ne unhe us cheez se payda kiya hai jise wo jaante hai
pas mujhe qasam hai mashriqo aur maghribo ke rab ki, (ke) hum yaqinan qaadir hai
us par ke us ke ewaz, un se acche log le aaye, aur hum aajiz nahi hai
pas tu unhe jhagadta khelta chohd de, yahaa tak ke ye apne us din se ja mile, jis ka un se waada kiya jaata hai
jis din ye qabro se daudte hoye niklenge, goya ke wo kisi jageh ki taraf tez tez ja rahe hai
un ki aankhe jhuki hoyi hogi, un par zillath cha rahi hogi, ye hai wo din jis ka un se waada kiya jaata tha
yaqinan hum ne Nuh(alaihissalaam) ko un ki khaum ki taraf bheja ke apni khaum ko dara do (aur qabardaar kardo) us se pehle ke un ke paas dardnaak azaab aa jaaye
Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne ) kaha aye meri khaum! main tumhe saaf saaf daraane waala hoon
ke tum Allah ki ibaadath karo aur osi se daro aur mera kaha maano
to wo tumhaare gunaah baqsh dega aur tumhe ek waqth muqarrara tak chohd dega, yaqinan Allah ka waada jab aa jaata hai to mu’aqqar nahi hota, kaash ke tumhe samajh hoti
Nuh (alaihissalaam) ne) kaha aye mere parvardigaar! main ne apni khaum ko raath din teri taraf bulaaya hai
magar mere bulaane se ye log aur zyaada bhaagne lage
main ne jab kabhi unhe teri baqshish ke liye bulaaya, unhone apni ongliya apne kaano mein daal li aur apne kapdo ko od liya aur ad gaye aur bada takabbur kiya
phir main ne unhe ba-awaaz bulandh bulaaya
aur beshak main ne un se elaaniya bhi kaha aur chupke chupke bhi
aur main ne kaha ke apne rab se apne gunaah baqsh waao (aur maafi maango) wo yaqinan bada baqshne waala hai
wo tum par asmaan ko qoob barasta hoa chohd dega
aur tumhe qoob pay dar pay maal aur aulaad mein taraqqi dega aur tumhe baghaath dega aur tumhaare liye nehre nikaal dega
tumhe kya ho gaya hai ke tum Allah ki bartari ka aqeeda nahi rakhte
halaan ke us ne tumhe tarah tarah se payda kiya hai
kya tum nahi dekhte ke Allah ta’ala ne upar ta-le kis tarah saath asmaan payda kar diye hai
aur un mein chaandh ko qoob jagmagata banaya hai aur suraj ko roushan chiraagh banaya hai
aur tum ko zameen se ek (qaas ehtemaam se) ugaaaya hai (aur payda kiya hai)
phir tumhe osi mein lauta le jayega aur (ek qaas tariqe) se phir nikaalega
aur tumhaare liye zameen ko Allah ta’ala ne farsh bana diya hai
ta ke tum us ki kushaada raaho mein chalo phiro
Nuh(alaihissalaam)) ne kaha aye mere parvardigaar! un logo ne meri to na-farmaani ki aur aiso ki farmabardaari ki, jin ke maal wa aulaad ne un ko (yaqinan) nuqsaan hee mein badaaya hai
aur un logo ne bada saqth fareb kiya
aur kaha unhone ke har giz apne mabudho ko na chohd na aur na wadh aur sava aur yaghoos aur ya’ooq aur nasr ko chohd na
aur unhone bahuth se logo ko gumraah kiya (ilaahi) tu un zaalimo ki gumraahi aur bada
ye log ba sabab apne gunaaho ke dubo diye gaye aur jahannam mein pahoncha diye gaye aur Allah ke siva apna koyi madadgaar unhone na paaya
aur (hazrath) Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke aye mere paalne waale! tu roye zameen par kisi kaafir ko rehne sehne waale na chohd
agar tu unhe chohd dega to (yaqinan) ye tere aur bandho ko (bhi) gumraah kar denge aur ye faajiro aur dheet kaafiro hee ko janam denge

aye mere parvardigaar! tu mujhe aur mere maa baap aur jo imaan ki haalath mein mere ghar mein aaye aur tamaam momin mardo aur aurto ko baqsh de aur kaafiro ko sivaaye barbaadhi ke, aur kisi baath mein na bada
aye Muhammad(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) aap kehde ke mujhe wahi ki gayi hai ke jino ki ek jamaath ne (Qur’aan) suna aur kaha ke hum ne ajeeb Qur’aan suna hai
jo raahe raasth ki taraf rehnumaayi karta hai, hum us par imaan laa chuke (ab) hum har giz kisi ko bhi apne rab ka shareek na banayenge
aur beshak hamaare rab ki shaan badi bulndh hai, na us ne kisi ko (apni) biwi banaaya hai na beta
aur ye ke hum mein ka be waqoof Allah ke baare mein qilaafe haq batein kaha karta tha
aur hum to yahi samjhte rahe ke na mumkin hai ke insaan aur jinaath Allah par jhoti baatein lagaaye
baath ye hai ke chandh insaan baaz jinnaath se panaah talab kiya karte thein, jis se jinnaath apni sarkashi mein aur bad gaye
aur (insaano) ne bhi tum jino ki tarah gumaan kar liya tha ke Allah kisi ko na bhejega (ya kisi ko dobara zinda na karega)
aur hum ne asmaan ko tatool kar dekha to ose saqth chaukidaaro aur saqth shulo se pur paaya
us se pehle hum batein sunne ke liye asmaan mein jageh jageh baith jaaya karte thein, ab jo bhi kaan lagaata hai, wo ek shole ko apni taak mein paata hai
hum nahi jaante ke zameen waalo ke saath kisi buraayi ka iraada kiya gaya hai ya un ke rab ka iraada un ke saath bhalaayi ka hai
aur ye ke (beshak) baaz to hum mein neko kaar hai aur baaz us ke bar aks bhi hai, hum muqtalif tariqo se bate hoye hai
aur hum ne samajh liya ke hum Allah ta’ala ko zameen mein har giz aajiz nahi kar sakte aur na hum bhaag kar ose hara sakte hai
hum to hidaayath ki baath sunte hee us par imaan laa chuke aur jo bhi apne rab par imaan layega, ose na kisi nuqsaan ka andesha hai, na zulm wa sitam ka
haan hum mein baaz to musalmaan hai aur baaz be insaaf hai, pas jo farmabardaar ho gaye, unhone to raahe raasth ka qasdh kiya
aur jo zaalim hai, wo jahannam ka indhan ban gaye
aur (aye Nabi(sallalahu alaihi wasallam) ye bhi keh do) ke agar log raahe raasth par sidhe rehte to, yaqinan hum unhe bahuth waafer paani pilaate
ta ke hum us mein unhe azmaale aur jo shaqs apne parvardigaar ke zikr se mu pher lega, to Allah ta’ala ose saqth azaab mein mubtela kar dega
aur ye ke masjide sirf Allah hee ke liye qaas hai, pas Allah ta’ala ke saath kisi aur ko na pukaaro
aur jab Allah ka bandha us ki ibaadath ke liye khada hoa to qareeb tha ke wo bheed ki bheed ban kar us par pil pade
aap keh dijiye ke main to sirf apne rab hee ko pukaarta hoon aur us ke saath kisi ko shareek nahi karta
keh dijiye ke mujhe tumhaare kisi nuqsaan, na-fe ka eqtiyaar nahi
keh dijiye ke mujhe har giz koyi Allah se bacha nahi sakta aur main har giz us ke siva koyi jaaye panaah bhi pa nahi sakta

albatta (mera kaam) Allah ki baath aur us ke paighamaath (logo ko) pahoncha dena hai, (ab) jo bhi Allah aur us ke rasool ki na manega, us ke liye jahannam ki aag hai, jis mein aise log hamesha rahenge
(un ki aankh na khulegi) yahaa tak ke ose dekh le jis ka un ko waada diya jaata hai, pas an qareeb jaan lenge ke kis ka madadgaar kamzoor aur kis ki jamaath kam hai
keh dijiye ke mujhe maloom nahi ke jis ka waada tum se kiya jaata hai, wo qareeb hai ya mera rab us ke liye door ki muddath muqarrar karega
wo ghayb ka jaanne waala hai aur apne ghayb par kisi ko mutthala nahi karta
sivaaye us paighambar ke jise wo pasand karle, lekin us ke bhi aage piche pehre daar muqarrar kar deta hai
ta ke un ke apne rab ke paighaam pahoncha dene ka ilm ho jaaye, Allah ta’ala ne un ke aas paas (ki tamaam chizo) ka ahaata kar rakha hai aur har cheez ki ginti ka shumaar kar rakha hai
aye kapde mein lipatne waale
raath (ke waqt namaaz) mein khade ho jaao magar kam
aadhi raath ya us se bhi kuch kam karle
ya us par badha de aur Qur’aan ko teher teher kar (saaf) padha kar
yaqinan hum tujh par bahuth bhaari baath an qareen naazil karenge
beshak raath ka uthna dil jamyi ke liye intehaayi munaasib hai aur baath ko bahuth durusth kar dene waala hai
yaqinan tujhe din mein bahuth shughal rehta hai
tu apne rab ke naam ka zikr kiya kar aur tamaam qalaayeq se kat kar us ki taraf mutawajjeh ho ja
mashriq wa maghrib ka parvardigaar, jis ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, tu osi ko apna kaar-saaz bana le
aur jo kuch wo kahe, tu sehta reh aur wafa daari ke saath un se alag thalag reh
aur mujhe un jhutlaane waale aasoda haal logo ko chohd de aur unhe zara si muhullath de
yaqinan hamaare haan saqth bediyaa hai aur sulagti hoyi jahannam hai
aur halaq mein atakne waala khaana hai aur dard dene waala azaab hai
jis din zameen aur pahaad thar thara jayenge aur pahaad misl bhar bhari reth ke tilo ke ho jayenge
beshak hum ne tumhaari taraf bhi, tum par gawaahi dene waala rasool bhej diya hai, jaise ke hum ne feraun ke paas rasool bheja tha
to feraun ne us rasool ki na-farmaani ki, to hum ne ose saqth (wabaal ki) pakad mein pakad liya
tum agar kaafir rahe to, us din kaise panaah paoge jo din baccho ko buda kar dega
jis din asmaan phat jayega, Allah ta’ala ka ye waada ho kar hee rehne waala hai
beshak ye nasihath hai, pas jo chaahe apne rab ki taraf raah eqtiyaar kare

aap ka rab ba-qoobi jaanta hai ke, aap aur aap ke saath ke logo ki, ek jamaath qareeb do tihaayi raath ke aur aadhi raath ke aur ek tihaayi raath ke tahajjud padti hai aur raath din ka pura andaaza Allah ta’ala ko hee hai, wo (qoob) jaanta hai ke tum ose hargiz na nibha sakoge, pas us ne tum par meherbaani ki, lehaaza jitna Qur’aan padna tumhaare liye asaan ho, utna hee pado, wo jaanta hai ke tum mein baaz bimaar bhi honge, baaz zameen mein chal phir kar Allah ta’ala ka fazl (yani rozi bhi) talaash karenge, aur kuch log Allah ta’ala ki raah mein jihaad bhi karenge, so tum ba-asaani jitna Qur’aan pad sako padho aur namaaz ki paabandi rakho aur zakaath dete raha karo aur Allah ta’ala ko accha qarz do aur jo neki tum apne liye aage bhejoge, ose Allah ta’ala ke haan behtar se behtar aur sawaab mein bahuth zyaada paoge, Allah ta’ala se maafi maangte raho, yaqinan Allah ta’ala baqshne waala meherbaan hai
aye kapda udne waale
khada ho ja aur agaah karde
aur apne rab hee ki badaaiya bayaan kar
apne kapdo ko paak rakha kar
na paaki ko chohd de
aur ehsaan kar ke zyaada lene ki qaahish na kar
aur apne rab ki raah mein sabr kar
pas jab ke soor mein phok maari jaayegi
to wo din bada saqt din hoga
(jo) kaafiro par asaan na hoga
mujhe aur ise chohd de, jise main ne akela payda kiya hai
aur ose bahuth sa maal de rakha hai
aur haazir baash farzandh bhi
aur main ne ose bahuth kuch kushaadgi de rakhi hai
phir bhi us ki chaahath hai ke main ose aur zyaada doon
nahi nahi, wo hamaari aayato ka muqaalif hai
an-qareeb main ose ek saqth chadaayi chadaonga
us ne ghaur kar ke tajweez ki
ose halaakath ho kaisi (tajweez) sonchi
wo phir ghaarath ho, kis tarah andaaza kiya
us ne phir dekha
phir tewri1 chadaayi aur mu banaya
phir bhi piche hat gaya aur ghuroor kiya
aur kehne laga ye to sirf jaadu hai jo naql kiya jaata hai
sivaaye insaani kalaam ke, kuch bhi nahi
main an-qareeb ose dozakh mein dalonga
aur tujhe kya qabar ke dozakh kya cheez hai
na wo baaqi rakhti hai na chohdti hai
qaal ko jhulsa deti hai
aur us mein unnis(19) (farishte muqarrar) hai

hum ne dozakh ke daaroghe sirf farishte rakhe hai aur hum ne un ki tedaadh sirf kaafiro ki azmaayesh ke liye muqarrar ki hai, ta ke ahle kitaab yaqeen karle aur ahle imaan ke imaan mein izaafa ho jaaye aur ahle kitaab aur ahle imaan shak na kare aur jin ke dilo mein bimaari hai, wo aur kaafir kahe ke is bayaan se Allah ta’ala ki kya muraad hai? isi tarah Allah ta’ala jise chaahta hai gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahta hai hidaayath deta hai, tere rab ke lashkaro ko us ke siva koyi nahi jaanta, ye tawakkal bani aadam ke liye saraasar pandh wa nasihath hai
sach kehta hoon, qasam hai chaandh ki
aur raath ki jab wo piche ha-te
aur subah ki jab ke roushan ho jaaye
ke (yaqinan jahannam) badi chizo mein se ek hai
bani aadam ko daraane waali
(yani) ose, jo tum mein se aage badna chaahe ya piche hatna chaahe
har shaqs apne amaal ke badhle mein girvi hai
magar daaye haath waale
ke wo bahishto mein baithe hoye gunehgaaro se
sawaal karte honge
tumhe dozakh mein kis cheez ne daala
wo jawaab denge ke hum namaazi na thein
na miskino ko khaana khilaate thein
aur hum behez karne waale (inkaariyo) ka saath de kar behes mubahese mein mashghool raha karte thein
aur roze jaza ko jhutlaate thein
yahaa tak ke hamein mauth aa gayi
pas unhe sifaarish karne waalo ki sifaarish nafa na degi
unhe kya ho gaya hai? ke nasihath se mu mod rahe hai
goya ke wo bidhke hoye ghadhe hai
jo sher se bhaage ho
balke un mein se har shaqs chaahta hai ke, ose khuli hoyi kitaabe di jaaye
har giz aisa nahi (ho sakta balke) ye qayaamath se be-khauf hai
sacchi baath to ye hai ke ye (Qur’aan) ek nasihath hai
ab jo chaahe is se nasihath haasil kare
aur wo us waqt nasihath haasil karenge, jab Allah ta’ala chaahe, wo osi laayeq hai ke us se dare aur us laayeq bhi ke wo baqshe
main qasam khaata hoon qayaamath ke din ki
aur qasam khaata hoon us nafs ki jo malaamath karne waala ho
kya insaan ye qayaal karta hai ke hum us ki haddiyaa jama karenge hee nahi
haan zaroor karenge, hum to qaadir hai, ke us ki por por tak durusth karde
balke insaan to chahta hai ke aage aage na farmaaniya karta jaaye
pochta hai ke qayaamath ka din kab aayega
pas jis waqth ke nigaah pathra jayegi
aur chaandh be-noor ho jayega
aur suraj aur chaandh jama kar diye jayenge
us din insaan kahega ke aaj bhaagne ki jagah kahaa hai
nahi nahi koyi panaah gaah nahi
aaj to tere parvardigaar ki taraf hee qaraar gaah hai
aaj insaan ko us ke aage bheje hoye aur piche chohde hoye se agaah kiya jayega
balke insaan khud apne upar aap hujjath hai
agar che kitne hee bahaane pesh kare
ye Nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) aap Qur’aan ko jaldi (yaad karne) ke liye apni zabaan ko harkath na de
us ka jama karna aur (aap ki zabaan se) padna hamaare zimme hai
hum jab ise padle to aap us ke padne ki pairvi kare
phir us ka waazeh kar dena hamaare zimme hai
nahi nahi, tum jaldi milne waali (dunya) ki muhabbath rakhte ho
aur aaqirath ko chohd baithe ho
us roz bahuth se chehre taro taaza aur ba-raunaq honge
apne rab ki taraf dekhte honge
aur kitne chehre us din (badh raunaq aur) udaas honge
samjhte honge ke un ke saath kamar tod dene waala maamla kiya jayega
nahi nahi, jab ruh hansali1 tak pahonchegi
aur kaha jayega ke koyi jhaad phok karne waala hai
aur jaan liya us ne ke ye waqte judaayi hai
aur pindli se pindli lipat jayegi
aaj tere parvardigaar ki taraf chalna hai
us ne na to tasdeeq ki na namaaz adaa ki
balke jhutlaaya aur ru-gardaani ki
phir apne ghar waalo ke paas itraata hoa gaya
afsoos hai tujh par hasrath hai tujh par
waay hai aur qaraabi hai tere liye
kya insaan ye samajhta hai ke ose bekaar chohd diya jayega
kya wo ek gaade paani ka qatra na tha, jo tapkaya gaya tha
phir wo laho ka lothda ho gaya, phir Allah ne ose payda kiya aur durusth banaya
phir us se jode yaani nar wa mada banaaye
kya (Allah ta’ala) us amr par qaadir nahi ke murde ko zinda karde
yaqinan guzra hai insaan par ek waqth zamaane mein, jab ke ye koyi qaabile zikr cheez na tha
beshak hum ne insaan ko mile jhule natfe se imtehaan ke liye payda kiya aur us ko sunta dekhta banaya
hum ne ose raah dikhaayi, ab qaah wo shukr guzaar bane, qaah na shukra
yaqinan hum ne kaafiro ke liye zanjire aur tauq aur shulo waali aag tayyaar kar rakhi hai
beshak nek log wo jaam piyenge jis ki aamizash kaafoor ki hai
jo ek chashma hai, jis se Allah ke bandhe piyenge, us ki nehre nikaal le jayenge (jidhar chaahe)
jo nazar puri karte hai aur us din se darte hai jis ki buraayi chaaro taraf phail jaane waali hai
aur Allah ta’ala ki muhabbath mein khaana khilaate hai, miskeen, yateem aur khaidiyo ko
hum to tumhe sirf Allah ta’ala ki raza mandhi ke liye khilaate hai, na tum se badhla chaahte hai, na shukr guzaari
beshak hum apne parvardigaar se us din ka khauf karte hai, jo udaasi aur saqti waala hoga
pas unhe Allah ta’ala ne us din ki buraayi se bacha liya aur unhe taazgi aur khushi pahonchaayi
aur unhe un ke sabr ke badhle jannath aur reshmi libaas ataa farmaaye
ye wahaan taqto par takye lagaaye hoye baithenge, na wahaa aftaab ki garmi dekhenge, na jaade ki saqti
un jannato ke saaye un par jhuke hoye honge aur un ke (mewe aur) gucche niche latkaaye hoye honge
aur un par chaandi ke bartano aur jaamo ka daur karaaya jayega jo shishe ke honge
shishe bhi chaandi ke jin ko (saaqi ne) andaaze se naap rakha hoga
aur unhe wahaa wo jaam pilaaye jayenge, jin ki aamizash zanjabeel1 ki hogi
jannath ki ek neher se jis ka naam sal sabeel hai
aur un ke ird gird ghumte phirte honge, wo kamsin bacche jo hamesha rehne waale hai, jab tu unhe dekhe to samjhe ke wo bikhre hoye sacche moti hai
tu wahaa jahaan kahi bhi nazar daalega saraasar nemate aur azeemo shaan saltanath bhi dekhega
un ke jismo par sabz baareek aur mote reshmi kapde honge aur unhe chaandi ke kangan ka zewar pehnaaya jayega aur unhe un ka rab paak saaf sharaab pilaayega
(kaha jayega) ke ye hai tumhaare amaal ka badhla aur tumhaari koshish ki qadar ki gayi hai
beshak hum ne tujh par ba-tadhreej Qur’aan naazil kiya hai
pas tu apne rab ke hukm par qaayam reh aur un mein se kisi gunehgaar ya na shukre ka kaha na maan
aur apne rab ke naam ka subaah wa shaam zikr kiya kar
aur raath ke waqth us ke saamne sajde kar aur bahuth raath tak us ki tasbih kiya kar
beshak ye log jaldi milne waali (dunya) ko chaahte hai aur apne piche ek bade bhaari din ko chohde dete hai
hum ne unhe payda kiya aur hum ne hee un ke jod aur bhandan mazbooth kiye aur hum jab chaahe un ke ewaz un jaise auro ko badal laaye
yaqinan ye to ek nasihath hai, pas jo chaahe apne rab ki raah le le
aur tum na chaahoge, magar ye ke Allah ta’ala hee chaahe, beshak Allah ta’ala ilm waala ba hikmath hai
jise chaahe apni rahmath mein dakhil karle aur zaalimo ke liye us ne dardnaak azaab tayyaar kar rakha hai
dil khush-kun chalti hawaao ki qasam
phir zoor se jhunka dene waaliyo ki qasam
phir (abar ko) ubhaar kar para gandha karne waaliyo ki qasam
phir haq wa baatil ko juda juda kar dene waale
aur wahi laane waale farishto ki qasam
jo (wahi) ilzaam utaarne ya agaah kar dene ke liye hoti hai
jis cheez ka tum se waada kiya jaata hai, wo yaqinan hone waali hai
pas jab sitaare be-noor kar diye jayenge
aur jab asmaan tod phod diya jayega
aur jab pahaad tukde tukde kar ke uda diye jayenge
aur jab rasulo ko waqte muqarrara par laaya jayega
kis din ke liye (un sab ko) ma-uqqar kiya gaya hai
faisle ke din ke liye
aur tujhe kya maloom ke faisle ka din kya hai
us din jhutlaane waalo ki qaraabi hai
kya hum ne aglo ko halaak nahi kiya
phir hum un ke baadh pichlo ko laaye
hum gunehgaaro ke saath isi tarah karte hai
us din jhutlaane waalo ke liye wayl (afsoos) hai
kya hum ne tumhe haqeer paani se (mani se) paida nahi kiya
phir hum ne ose mazbooth wa mehfooz jageh mein rakha
ek muqarrara waqt tak
phir hum ne andaaza kiya aur hum kya qoob andaaza karne waale hai
us din takzeeb karne waalo ki qaraabi hai
kya hum ne zameen ko sametne waali nahi banaya
zindo ko bhi aur murdo ko bhi
aur hum ne us mein bulandh wa bhaari pahaad bana diye aur tumhe sayraab karne waala mitha paani pilaaya
us din jhoot jaanne waalo ke liye (wayl) aur afsoos hai
us dozakh ki taraf jaao, jise tum jhutlaate rahe thein
chalo teen shaaqo waale saaye ki taraf
jo dar asl na saaya dene waala hai aur na shole se bacha sakta hai
yaqinan dozakh chingaariyaa phekti hai jo misl mahel ke hai
goya ke wo zardh oont hai
aaj un jhoot jaanne waalo ki durgath hai
aaj (ka din) wo din hai ke ye bol bhi na sakenge
na unhe maazerath ki ijaazath di jayegi
us din jhutlaane waalo ki qaraabi hai
ye hai faisla ka din, hum ne tumhe aur aglo ko sab ko jama kar liya hai
pas agar tum mujh se koyi chaal chal sakte ho, to chal lo
wayl hai us din jhutlaane waalo ke liye
be-shak parhezgaar log saayo mein hai aur behte chashmo mein
aur un mewo mein jin ki wo qaahish kare
(aye jannatiyo!) khao piyo maze se apne kiye hoye amaal ke badhle
yaqinan hum neki karne waalo ko isi tarah jaza dete hai
us din saccha na jaanne waalo ke liye wayl (afsoos) hai
(aye jhutlaane waalo) tum dunya mein thoda sa kha lo aur fayda uthalo, beshak tum gunehgaar ho
us din jhutlaane waalo ke liye saqt halaakath hai
un se jab kaha jaata hai ke ruko karlo to nahi karte
us din jhutlaane waalo ki tabaahi hai
ab is Qur’aan ke baadh kis baath par imaan layenge
